description: Entry-level classic bindings for kids and youth, with a step-in design that locks with an audible click, so you know when it's securely closed. The wide binding contact area adds torsional rigidity for good power transfer and control. The low-stack height gives you a feel for the snow surface as you power across it.Step-in design automatically clicks closed.Low-profile stack height is stable in the glide phase and feels precise as you ski.Compatible with IFP mounting plates only.Fits sizes 25-40.
name: Fischer Tour Step-In Jr IFP Bindings - Unisex
